_header: If thou wilt been rich or cleped holy
_description: On flattery — one couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook translating ‘Si vis ditari vel ut propheta vocari…’, which follows it

NLS18721.Transcription:
ȝef þu wilt ben riche or cleped holiLer to flateren for
                    þei ben laten wel bi
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 3.
